analysis.key_quote: It is highly ironic that given the constant screw ups by officials in the upper echelons of our current government those same people are trying to make it easier to dismiss people for supposed poor performance.
analysis.rationale: The comment criticizes the proposed rule by highlighting the irony of holding lower-level employees to performance standards while upper officials are not subject to similar scrutiny. This reflects concerns about merit-based systems and politicization, indicating opposition to the rule.
